sentences.english: The little ugly duck murmured while walked, suddenly a courser scurried out.
sentences.chinese: 醜小鴨邊走邊說，突然，一直獵狗竄了出來。

sentences.english: He was not unlike a hurried animal, deftly pursued by hunter and hound .
sentences.chinese: 他正象一隻困獸，給獵人獵狗追得緊緊的。

sentences.english: Following the trail with the sureness of a bloodhound, came the general.
sentences.chinese: 就象尾隨追蹤的兇猛獵狗那麼準確，將軍跟了上來。

sentences.english: Tod eventually meets a hunting dog named Copper and the two hit it off.
sentences.chinese: 託德後來遇見了一直名叫卡帕的獵狗，他倆好上了。

sentences.english: It shows a fox being disembowelled by a pack of hounds.
sentences.chinese: 畫面中一隻狐狸正被一羣獵狗撕咬得腸子外流。

sentences.english: It was a little bright-eyed terrier.
sentences.chinese: 它是一條小獵狗，眼睛亮亮的。

sentences.english: The man whipped the dogs in when they scattered.
sentences.chinese: 當獵狗跑散了的時候，那個人用鞭子把他們趕在一起。

sentences.english: The hounds had winded the fox.
sentences.chinese: 獵狗聞出了有狐狸的氣味。

sentences.english: I would keep a pack of foxhounds , and drink a bottle of wine every day.
sentences.chinese: 我要養一羣獵狗，還要每天喝一瓶酒。
於是穆那查到了獵狗那裏。

sentences.english: The hounds were baying at the box.
The hound found the place where the deer lodged.
sentences.chinese: 獵狗找到了那頭鹿躲藏過的地方。

sentences.english: I made her a superlative horsewoman who rode sidesaddle to hounds.
sentences.chinese: 她是最高級女騎師騎着賽德薩德爾獵狗。

sentences.english: A fox breaks wind in order to escape from hunting dogs.
He fetched his horse from the stable and called to his hound.
sentences.chinese: 他從廄裏牽出馬來，又喚來了獵狗。

sentences.english: Doberman aware of the shortage, but angry hunters return to the side.
sentences.chinese: 獵狗知道實在追不上了，只好悻悻地回到獵人身邊。

definition: child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
to charge/to pounce on/to swoop down on
extraordinary strength/super strong/strong as an ox
